Vincent Tan Wen Bin, Assistant Vice President at Thinkers AllianceLevel 5. GeniusAnswered on 30 Jul 2019One thing that I would like to highlight is to take note on the taxes on property and also the falling AUD. The investment might not look as favorable when these factors are involved.0 comments0
